extractedContext.realStory: Discovered a critical race condition in the data sync layer two weeks before a major launch and led a 72-hour effort to fix it alongside a small team.
extractedContext.obstacle: A race condition in the data sync layer that could have caused customer double-charges on every order.
extractedContext.keyDecision: Immediately pulled in Sarah, Marcus, and Dev to trace and resolve the issue within 72 hours.
extractedContext.counterfactual: Customers would have been double-charged on every order during the launch, potentially causing major financial and reputational damage.
extractedContext.metric: Deployment frequency improved from every two weeks to 5-10 times per day; issue resolved within 72 hours and validated in 2 hours.
extractedContext.learning: Proactively identifying and resolving critical issues under pressure can prevent major failures and lead to lasting process improvements.
